content.title: RHSA-2021:1846: idm:DL1 and idm:client security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
content.description:
Red Hat Identity Management (IdM) is a centralized authentication, identity management, and authorization solution for both traditional and cloud-based enterprise environments. 

Security Fix(es):

* jquery: Passing HTML containing <option> elements to manipulation methods could result in untrusted code execution (CVE-2020-11023)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.
